name: Space Flowers
description: Space Flowers is an intra-galactic tradewars game. Buy and sell flowers as you upgrade your spaceship and explore the galaxy, locating lost family members along the way. Fight off an evil extra-galactic empire when you are ready. Great fun for all ages!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Later Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 16 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 16 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 1 Ghz or faster DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 16 MB available space
